name: INAddMediaMediaItemUnsupportedReason
desc: Reasons the app can’t add the media item.

items.name: case loginRequired
items.desc: The user must log in to the app.

items.name: case subscriptionRequired
items.desc: The user must have a subscription to the app's service.

items.name: case unsupportedMediaType
items.desc: The media is an unsupported type.

items.name: case explicitContentSettings
items.desc: The content settings don’t allow the user to add the media item.

items.name: case cellularDataSettings
items.desc: The cellular data settings don’t allow the user to add the media item.

items.name: case restrictedContent
items.desc: The media item is restricted content.

items.name: case regionRestriction
items.desc: The media is unavailable to add in the user’s geographic location.
